entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
LOWS AROUND 15

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
